SA11sanss01u:628_0: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /

SA11sanss01u:638_1: tathânyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:645_0: yo 'ham asyârthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyôddhuratād gatvâsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpādayāmi /
SA11sanss01u:647_0: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathâsya
SA11sanss01u:655_0: nêha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā /
SA11sanss01u:657_0: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:660_0: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanakôpasaṃkramya
SA11sanss01u:664_0: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam
SA11sanss01u:668_0: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ câinaṃ tyakṣyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:669_0: etac ca vastu parityajyâhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi
SA11sanss01u:669_1: etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
SA11sanss01u:670_0: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca
SA11sanss01u:672_0: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /
SA11sanss01u:673_0: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:683_0: mā paritāpsīs tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye /
SA11sanss01u:690_0: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatrâprasādo bodhisatve vā
SA11sanss01u:691_0: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ anavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cêdaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ //
SA11sanss01u:693_0: catvārême śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante /
SA11sanss01u:700_0: yasyême śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa
SA11sanss01u:704_0: saṃkleśadharmo vatâyaṃ lokâmiṣaguruko vatâyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatâyam iti /
SA11sanss01u:705_0: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti /
SA11sanss01u:728_0: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe nôtsarjanacittam
SA11sanss01u:729_0: utpādayen na sa parivārôpādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate /
SA11sanss01u:730_0: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam
SA11sanss01u:731_0: upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastûpādātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:733_0: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâivaṃ cittam
SA11sanss01u:736_0: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat
SA11sanss01u:737_0: kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi
SA11sanss01u:737_1: satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastârthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādârthikebhyo netraṃ netrârthikebhyo dāsyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:738_0: māṃsaṃ māṃsârthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitârthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjârthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgârthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:739_0: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta
SA11sanss01u:740_0: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati
SA11sanss01u:741_0: tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:750_0: tad yathâpi nāma kula-putra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā
SA11sanss01u:751_0: hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā
SA11sanss01u:752_0: puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya nâivaṃ bhavati
SA11sanss01u:754_0: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti //
SA11sanss01u:755_0: api tu khalu punar avikalpâiva hīnamadhyôtkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
SA11sanss01u:756_0: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā
SA11sanss01u:757_0: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenârthaḥ tat tad eva me
SA11sanss01u:760_0: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu
SA11sanss01u:762_0: tad yathâpi nāmêmāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni
SA11sanss01u:765_0: nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ satvānāṃ nānôpabhogaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanss01u:766_0: evam evâham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām
SA11sanss01u:780_0: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃdarśayamānaḥ anuttarasukhôpadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ
SA11sanss01u:783_0: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ .
SA11sanss01u:787_1: sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:793_0: dhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇôdyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanss01u:809_0: svaśarīrânadhyavasitasantānaḥ aniketasarvabuddhadharmânusmṛtivihāry- asārāc charīrāt sārâdānâbhiprāyêti hi
SA11sanss01u:810_0: bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
SA11sanss01u:815_0: tto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto 'lulitasantānacitto mahāsthāmabalâdhāno 'nadhyavasitaśarīracitto 'nabhiniviṣṭavacanacitto jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā .
SA11sanss01u:816_0: adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryôpacārāṃ /
SA11sanss01u:817_0: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru /
SA11sanss01u:818_0: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi
SA11sanss01u:825_0: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ
SA11sanss01u:841_0: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā
SA11sanss01u:846_0: sarvabodhisatvasamatôpāttair mahādānârambhair manasâkāṅkṣitaiḥ sarvayācakair ananutāpyacittair dānavastubhiḥ
SA11sanss01u:859_0_1: sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛtbukkāphupphuṣaṃ
SA11sanss01u:860_0: prasannaprītyākārair netrair bodhisatvaniryātena premṇâvyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgenâsārāt kāyāt
SA11sanss01u:864_0: yadi câham etadyācanakasyâitaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛtbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ /
SA11sanss01u:871_2: svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann eva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatîty ātmabhāvôtsargaṃ kṛtvā //
SA11sanss01u:873_0: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyânyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu
SA11sanss01u:878_0: mayâiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyâbhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt /
SA11sanss01u:880_0: snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayôpakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati /
SA11sanss01u:898_0: ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā
SA11sanss01u:899_1: paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvâlaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathârhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan
SA11sanss01u:899_2: putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vâpasṛjan /
SA11sanss01u:901_0: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān
SA11sanss01u:902_0: kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān
SA11sanss01u:905_0: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:910_0_0: yāvan nānābhājanāni vividhasaṃbhārāṇy anekakāṃsyapātrīr aprameyasaṃbhārôpacitā hiraṇyasuvarṇarūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇās
SA11sanss01u:928_1: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ
SA11sanss01u:932_0: dhisatvaguneṣu pratipadyamāno 'bhijātabodhisatvâdhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi
SA11sanss01u:937_0: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan
SA11sanss01u:943_0_1: anapekṣacitto dadānaḥ parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo
SA11sanss01u:946_0: bhyo vâbhijātabodhisatvadharmabhāṇakebhyo vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne
SA11sanss01u:947_0: sarvabuddhaśāsane vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ sâivaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati //
SA11sanss01u:948_0: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣûpadiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:954_0: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss01u:955_0: anenâhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya /
SA11sanss01u:993_0: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān
SA11sanss01u:994_0: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran /
SA11sanss01u:995_0: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike
SA11sanss01u:1003_0: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca
SA11sanss01u:1018_0: yena ca sukhôpadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhôpadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti /
SA11sanss01u:1025_0: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasâgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ
SA11sanss01u:1086_0: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrâtyāgacittânutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtânupālanatayā /
SA11sanss01u:1103_0: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā
SA11sanss01u:1106_0: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca
SA11sanss01u:1110_0: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittôtpādās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmiṣyāmîtîdam anāgatakauśalyaṃ /
